mapper.select: SELECT * FROM maintain_record as mr where mr.machine_nameplate='${nameplate}'

SELECT userOfCustomerInMachine.name as machineCustomerName, userOfCustomerInMachine.phone as machineCustomerPhone, a.name as agent_name, a.phone as agent_phone, mr.*, m.facory_date, m.nameplate, m.machine_type, m.needle_num, m.head_num, m.head_distance, m.order_num, m.x_distance, m.y_distance, m.loadinglist, m.geo_location, userOfCustomerInMaintainRecord.address as customerAddressInMaintainRecord, userOfCustomerInMaintainRecord.name as customerNameInMaintainRecord, userOfCustomerInMaintainRecord.phone as customerPhoneInMaintainRecord, userOfMaintainChargePerson.name AS maintain_charge_person_name, userOfMaintainChargePerson.phone as maintainChargePersonPhone, mcf.customer_mark as maintainFeedbackCustomerMark, mcf.customer_suggestion as maintainFeedbackCustomerSuggestion
FROM maintain_record mr LEFT JOIN machine m ON mr.machine_nameplate = m.nameplate LEFT JOIN `user` as userOfCustomerInMachine ON userOfCustomerInMachine.id = m.customer LEFT JOIN agent a ON a.id = userOfCustomerInMachine.agent LEFT JOIN user userOfMaintainChargePerson ON userOfMaintainChargePerson.id = mr.maintain_charge_person LEFT JOIN user as userOfCustomerInMaintainRecord ON userOfCustomerInMaintainRecord.id = mr.customer LEFT JOIN maintain_customer_feedback as mcf ON mcf.id = mr.customer_feedback WHERE 1 = 1
-- AND customerName like CONCAT('%','${customerName}','%' ) AND userOfCustomerInMachine.name like CONCAT('%','${customerName}','%' )
-- AND agent_name like CONCAT('%','${agent}','%' ) AND a.name like CONCAT('%','${agent}','%' )
and m.nameplate like CONCAT('%','${nameplate}','%' )
and m.order_num like CONCAT('%','${orderNum}','%' )
and m.machine_type like CONCAT('%','${machineType}','%' )
-- and mr.maintain_charge_person like CONCAT('%','${maintainChargePerson}','%' ) and userInMaintainRecord.name like CONCAT('%','${maintainChargePerson}','%' )
-- AND customerName = '${customerName}' AND userOfCustomerInMachine.name = '${customerName}'
-- AND agent_name = '${agent}' AND a.name = '${agent}'
and m.nameplate = '${nameplate}'
and m.order_num = '${orderNum}'
and m.machine_type = '${machineType}'
and mr.maintain_charge_person = '${maintainChargePerson}'
and mr.maintain_status = #{maintainStatus}
and DATE_FORMAT(maintain_date_actual,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{query_start_time_maintain}
and DATE_FORMAT(maintain_date_actual,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{query_finish_time_maintain}
ORDER By mr.maintain_date_actual DESC

SELECT mr.`maintain_status`, m.* FROM maintain_record as mr LEFT JOIN maintain_members as mm ON mm.maintain_record_id = mr.id LEFT JOIN user as userOfMembersInMaintainRecord ON userOfMembersInMaintainRecord.id = mm.user_id LEFT JOIN user as userOfChargeInMaintainRecord ON userOfChargeInMaintainRecord.id = mr.maintain_charge_person LEFT JOIN machine as m ON m.nameplate = mr.machine_nameplate where -- 保养状态 0：待分配，1：已分配(但未接单）2：已接受任务，3：保养完成(客户未确认)，4：客户已确认保养结果 (mr.maintain_status = 1 or mr.maintain_status = 2 or mr.maintain_status = 3 )
and (userOfMembersInMaintainRecord.name = #{userName} or userOfChargeInMaintainRecord.name = #{userName})
